1552600.name: Joon Shining
1552600.description:
Joon Shining is a golf-like platformer with a fantasy twist. Combining traditional golf & mini-golf with elements of puzzle platforming, it evolves the hit-and-wait formula of golf by adding *magic*!

You play as Joon - a young wizard travelling across the multiverse. As you advance through 8 unique worlds, learn to master your arcane powers to solve weird & mind-bending challenges.

Harness your abilities to manipulate physics. Solve puzzles. Discover collectibles. And learn the secret of the Mage Dropsâ€¦

Joon Shining is a challenging physics-based platformer, with a myriad of magical mechanics! Gameplay requires carefully honed skills and picking the right arcane approach is key.

Influence shots mid-flight with magical abilities:

ğŸ”¥ Burn away obstacles with fire

âœ¨ Use magic rings to gain the power of flight

ğŸ”® Enchant airstreams and detonate ancient explosives to propel you across the level

& More!

Enchant environments to your advantage:

ğŸŒ² Grow plants into new platforms

ğŸ—» Lure dangerous creatures away to clear a path forward

Discover 8 unique worlds, including: a forest, an underwater oasis, machine world, a procedurally generated trickster world, and a mysterious cosmic void!

Each environment has its own magical possibilities, secrets, and traps. Some can be used to your advantage, and some provide tricky hazards.

Shots can cling to jelly walls, bounce off bubbles, be propelled by explosions, and float on clouds. Living bushes can block the shots. Some puzzles even hide secret collectibles & lore tied to the gameâ€™s true ending.

Explore and experiment to uncover the unique possibilities of each biome!

â€¢ 20+ hours of gameplay

â€¢ 100+ levels

â€¢ 100 collectibles to discover - each a self-contained micro-puzzle

â€¢ Challenging gameplay and a super-high skill ceiling for expert players going for a gold rank in every level

â€¢ A unique contrasting of serene atmospheres against focused-precision gameplay

â€¢ Incredible and unique soundtrack

Starry skies. Bright beautiful worlds. Lush forests. Underwater lagoons. Floating clouds. And relaxing music.

Perfect for when you need a cosy chill-out game, with hidden depths and challenge.

REVIEWS

"A stunning looking platformer that puts a twist on the golf genre"

â€“As We Play

"Joon Shining has some of that [Nights Into Dreams] texture in it: the echo of kids who cry out for a softer world and green-velvet grass with nostalgic checkerboards. Crayon paintings of trees and flowers and the strange abstract creatures that call them home. The silence and sound of the wind passing through, never the same as before, a gentle stranger making an invisible path through all of it"

â€“Start Menu

"It looks pretty majestic...Itâ€™s hard to imagine a golf game looking this beautiful but Joon Shining is going to challenge everything I thought was true"

â€“Kotaku

"I canâ€™t recall seeing anything quite like this beforeâ€¦[it] left a huge smile on my face. Itâ€™s very clever and beautiful to look at"

â€“Get Indie Gaming

"A glorious entry into the puzzle and golfing genre"

â€“Beta Tested Game Reviewed

â€œIf you like puzzle games and golf I highly recommend wishlisting Joon Shiningâ€

â€“Ready Set Indie Games

â€œIf you're up for a challenging new spin on a classic game, Joon Shining is the physics-based 2D-platforming golf-like game for you!â€

â€“NerdLovesGeek

â€œIt really shines through, the idea of taking a very simple mechanic and getting as much fun out of that mechanic as possibleâ€¦Itâ€™s essentially like a golf gameâ€¦then they add to that brilliant effects and magicâ€¦itâ€™s easy to play difficult to masterâ€

â€“Raccoon Media Cafe

â€œYouâ€™re now trying to navigate a weird magical obstacle course. Even the way you control the ball is differentâ€¦you can stop or accelerate your ball mid-air, and you can magically control some of the obstacles, making the environment interactive. Joon Shining feels like a golf game, just not like any other golf game Iâ€™ve ever played.â€

â€“CSHPicone, Steam Curator

Joon Shining is being created by the Aussie/London indie studio, Orchid of Redemption. The team is dedicated to developing carefully-crafted minimalist games that create an atmosphere of peacefulness, magic, and mystery.
